currentThesis.title: Solana Agent Identity Standard (SAID)
currentThesis.summary: Solana lacks native AI agent identity/reputation infrastructure. ERC-8004 leads on Ethereum. Build the Solana equivalent: on-chain identity registry, reputation system, validation hooks. First-mover on fastest chain for agent economy.
validatedBy: ERC-8004 exists on Ethereum, nothing native on Solana
Solana Agent Kit has 60+ actions but NO identity layer
No SIMD proposal for agent identity exists
8004-solana is just a port, not native program
Trillion-dollar agent economy needs identity rails
openQuestions: Build native Solana program or accelerate 8004-solana?
Partner with Solana Agent Kit team?

pipeline.description: Native Solana program: Agent NFT registry + reputation oracle + validation hooks. The ERC-8004 of Solana.
Visualize agent scores across chains, starting with SAID data
